Felixstowe Library

Manager: Steph Merrett

Crescent Road, Felixstowe
IP11 7BY

  • Tel: 01394 330850
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Friends of Felixstowe Library
  • Facebook

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday 1000 – 1600
Tuesday 0900 – 1730
Wednesday 0900 – 1930
Thursday 0900 – 1730
Friday 0900 – 1730
Saturday 0900 – 1700
Sunday 1000 – 1600

Room & venue hire

Room and space hire at Felixstowe Library →

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: Pay & Display car park opposite
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Customer toilet
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in
  • Also available: East Suffolk Council customer services. Visit the East Suffolk Council website for opening times.

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available up to A3 size
  • Colour printing: available up to A4 size
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Baby Bounce and Tot Rock

Friday, 0930-1000

Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers. Term-time only.

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Baby Bounce and Tot Rock

Friday, 1130-1200

Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers. Term-time only.

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Chatterbooks: for 7-11 year-olds

Saturday once a month, 1030-1200

Talk about books, play games, choose your next read and enjoy special giveaways. Contact the library to sign up.

Stories in the Middle: stories and activities for young children. Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers.

Friday, 1030-1115

Summer Reading Challenge

Summer Reading Challenge

Mondays and Sundays, 1000-1500

Sign up, talk to a volunteer about your latest read, borrow your next book and collect rewards.

Summer Reading Challenge

Tuesday-Saturday, 1000-1400

Sign up, talk to a volunteer about your latest read, borrow your next book and collect rewards.

Older people's events

Top Time: events and activities for older people

Tuesday, 1400-1600

Reading groups

Words book group

second Thursday of the month, 1100-1200

Friendly group discussing a wide variety of books, please speak to a member of library staff for more information.

IT help

Computer course for beginners from Lxpert: £20 for a five-week course (first week free taster)

Tuesdays from 23 July, 1000-1200

Join us for a free internet taster session on Tuesday 23 July, followed by sessions on email, finding information online, internet security and safety, and social media and the cloud. Advance booking by contacting the library is essential.

Health & wellbeing events

Open space: drop in for health info and chats. All welcome.

Thursday, 1400-1600

See the latest Felixstowe Open Space timetable.

Sharing Stories drop-in: for adults with learning disabilities

Wednesday, 1330-1500

Councillor surgeries & professional advice

NatWest information drop-in

every other Tuesday, 0930-1230

A community assistance opportunity to support existing NatWest customers with their banking needs.

Fundraising, stalls & book sales

Country market: home grown crafted and made produce

Friday, 0900-1200
